solution_code:
import numpy as np
from typing import List

def average_distance_from_centroid_comparison(contour1: List[List[int]], contour2: List[List[int]]) -> float:
    centroid1 = np.mean(contour1, axis=0)
    avg_distance1 = np.mean(np.sqrt(np.sum((contour1 - centroid1)**2, axis=1)))

    centroid2 = np.mean(contour2, axis=0)
    avg_distance2 = np.mean(np.sqrt(np.sum((contour2 - centroid2)**2, axis=1)))

    return abs(avg_distance1 - avg_distance2)
